start.title: The Cave Entrance
start.text: You stand at the mouth of a dark cave, rumored to hold an ancient dragon and its treasure. A chilling wind blows from within. To the side, a treacherous-looking path seems to lead up the mountain.

cave_darkness.title: Into the Dark
cave_darkness.text: The cave is pitch black. You can hear the faint sound of dripping water and something... large... breathing in the distance. You have a torch and flint in your pack.

mountain_path.title: A Treacherous Climb
mountain_path.text: You begin to climb the steep mountain path. The rocks are loose under your feet. You slip!

choices.text: Grab for a nearby thorny vine.
Try to roll into the fall.

torch_lit.title: The Dragon's Hoard
torch_lit.text: The torchlight illuminates a vast cavern filled with glittering piles of gold and jewels. In the center of the hoard, a massive red dragon sleeps.

choices.text: Attempt to sneak past the dragon.
Grab a handful of gold and run.

dark_pit.title: The Pit
dark_pit.text: Creeping forward in the dark, your foot finds only empty air. You tumble into a deep pit. Your adventure ends here.

vine_grab.title: A Thorny Success
vine_grab.text: Your hands are scratched, but the vine holds! You pull yourself onto a hidden ledge that reveals a secret, well-lit entrance into the side of the cavern. You can see the dragon's hoard from here.

tumble_fail.title: A Nasty Fall
tumble_fail.text: You tumble down the rocky slope, injuring your leg. You are in no condition to continue. Your adventure ends here.

sneak_success.title: Freedom!
sneak_success.text: You hold your breath and creep silently around the edge of the cavern. You find a passage on the other side and emerge into the sunlight, victorious!

dragon_wakes.title: A Grave Mistake
dragon_wakes.text: The clinking of coins echoes in the cavern. A massive golden eye snaps open. The dragon is awake, and it is not happy. Your adventure ends here, in a cloud of fire.
